events.description: A conference about React.

events.name: JavaScript Summit
events.description: A summit for JavaScript developers.

events.name: Web Development Bootcamp
events.description: An intensive bootcamp for aspiring web developers.

events.name: UI/UX Design Workshop
events.description: A hands-on workshop focused on UI/UX design principles.

events.name: Tech Leadership Conference
events.description: A conference for tech leaders and managers.

events.name: Startup Pitch Event
events.description: An event where startups pitch their ideas to investors.

events.name: Cybersecurity Symposium
events.description: A symposium on the latest trends and challenges in cybersecurity.

events.name: TechCrunch Disrupt
events.description: An annual technology conference hosted by TechCrunch. It features keynote speakers, startup pitches, and discussions on the latest tech trends.

events.name: CES (Consumer Electronics Show)
events.description: A global event showcasing the latest in consumer electronics and technology innovations. Exhibitors include leading tech companies and startups.

events.name: Google I/O
events.description: Google’s annual developer conference where new software, tools, and APIs are announced. It includes technical sessions, hands-on labs, and keynote speeches.

events.name: Apple WWDC (Worldwide Developers Conference)
events.description: Apple’s annual event where new software updates, technologies, and tools for developers are introduced. It includes sessions, workshops, and keynote presentations.

events.name: Microsoft Ignite
events.description: Microsoft’s flagship tech conference for IT professionals and developers. It focuses on Microsoft’s latest products and technologies, including Azure, Windows, and more.

events.name: AWS re
events.description: Amazon Web Services’ annual conference for cloud computing, featuring new AWS products, deep-dive technical sessions, and keynotes from industry leaders.

events.name: Black Hat USA
events.description: A leading information security conference that focuses on the latest cybersecurity research, trends, and techniques. It features presentations from security experts and practitioners.

events.name: DEF CON
events.description: One of the world’s largest and most notable hacker conventions. It includes talks, workshops, and competitions focused on security and hacking techniques.

events.name: SXSW (South by Southwest)
events.description: A conglomeration of film, interactive media, and music festivals and conferences. The tech component includes panels, workshops, and showcases of new technologies and innovations.

events.name: Strata Data & AI Conference
events.description: A conference focused on data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. It features keynotes, case studies, and hands-on sessions with industry leaders.

events.name: The Next Web Conference
events.description: A technology and business conference focusing on emerging tech trends and the future of the internet. It includes talks from tech leaders and networking opportunities.

events.name: Rise Conference
events.description: A global technology conference that brings together startups, investors, and tech leaders. It features keynotes, panel discussions, and networking events.

events.name: Google Cloud Next
events.description: Google Cloud’s annual event focused on cloud computing innovations, with sessions on product updates, cloud strategy, and practical implementations.

events.name: Oracle OpenWorld
events.description: Oracle’s premier event for business leaders and IT professionals. It covers Oracle’s software and hardware products, including cloud computing, AI, and more.

events.name: IBM Think
events.description: IBM’s annual conference featuring sessions on cloud computing, AI, and data analytics. It includes keynote speeches, product showcases, and breakout sessions.

events.name: Gartner IT Symposium/Xpo
events.description: Gartner’s flagship IT conference that provides insights into technology trends, leadership strategies, and innovation. It includes keynotes, workshops, and networking opportunities.

events.name: TechEd by Microsoft
events.description: A conference for IT professionals and developers focusing on Microsoft’s latest technologies, tools, and platforms. It features in-depth technical sessions and hands-on labs.

events.name: European Women in Technology
events.description: A conference dedicated to women in technology, offering keynotes, panel discussions, and workshops to support and inspire women in the tech industry.

events.name: Viva Technology
events.description: A major European tech event focused on innovation and startups. It features presentations from tech leaders, startup showcases, and networking opportunities.

events.name: TechFest
events.description: A series of tech events held globally that focuses on tech talent, innovation, and industry trends. It includes networking, panel discussions, and product showcases.
